errors.error_description: Installing pip dependencies before creating and activating virtual environment
correction_candidates:
python -m venv helios_env
source helios_env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

virtualenv helios_env
. helios_env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

conda create -n helios_env python=3.8
conda activate helios_env
pip install -r requirements.txt

python3 -m venv helios_env
helios_env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt
errors.golden_answer:
python -m venv helios_env
source helios_env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt
